lines.text: I want to serve a summons on Olin Blake.
You're not tired and I'm not kiddin'!
Well, looks like we hit it big this time, son.
Yeah, the deeper we go, the better she gets.
Well, we'll have all we'll ever want, and more, too.
Then maybe I can have a horse all my own - and a gun!
Well, you can have horse is all right, but I don't like guns, 'cept for huntin'.
Yeah, but everyone packs a gun around here.
Well, that's 'cause this is a new territory, but there'll be law and order here long before you'll be ready to shoot.
Huckleberry pie for folks that wash their hands and face!
[when his father is mortally wounded by Blake's gang, young Bob vows to avenge him]
No, no, Bobby. Remember what I told you?
You said the law was comin'. Then this happened!
But it is comin'. And I want you to promise me... you'll always uphold the law.
Yes, sir. At least, I'll do my very best.
